person.persName: John W. Puntney (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer and postmaster. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy Campbell Putney. Father of Joseph J. Putney and John W. Putney, Jr. Farmer in Ballard County, Kentucky, in 1860. Postmaster for Pools Landing in Ballard County from June 6, 1861 to February 28, 1863. Farmer in Ballard County in 1863.
